org.apache.ambari.server.security.encryption

Interface CredentialStoreService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CredentialStoreServiceImpl

    public interface CredentialStoreService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean containsCredential(String clusterName, String alias)
      Tests to see if the requested alias exists in any CredentialStore
      boolean containsCredential(String clusterName, String alias, CredentialStoreType credentialStoreType)
      Tests to see if the requested alias exists in ether the persistent or the temporary CredentialStore
      Credential getCredential(String clusterName, String alias)
      Retrieves the specified credential looking in the temporary and then the persistent CredentialStore
      Credential getCredential(String clusterName, String alias, CredentialStoreType credentialStoreType)
      Retrieves the specified credential looking in ether the persistent or the temporary CredentialStore
      CredentialStoreType getCredentialStoreType(String clusterName, String alias)
      Gets the type of the credential store used to store the requested credential
      boolean isInitialized()
      Tests this CredentialStoreService to check if it has been properly initialized
      boolean isInitialized(CredentialStoreType credentialStoreType)
      Tests this CredentialStoreService to check if ether the persistent or the temporary CredentialStore has been properly initialized
      Map<String,CredentialStoreType> listCredentials(String clusterName)
      Maps the existing alias names to their relevant credential store types.
      void removeCredential(String clusterName, String alias)
      Removes the specified credential from all CredentialStores
      void removeCredential(String clusterName, String alias, CredentialStoreType credentialStoreType)
      Removes the specified credential from ether the persistent or the temporary CredentialStore
      void setCredential(String clusterName, String alias, Credential credential, CredentialStoreType credentialStoreType)
      Adds a new credential to ether the persistent or the temporary CredentialStore

      The supplied key will be converted into UTF-8 bytes before being stored.

    • Method Detail

      • setCredential

        void setCredential(String clusterName,
                   String alias,
                   Credential credential,
                   CredentialStoreType credentialStoreType)
            throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Adds a new credential to ether the persistent or the temporary CredentialStore

        The supplied key will be converted into UTF-8 bytes before being stored.

        Parameters:
        clusterName - the name of the cluster the credential is related to
        alias - a string declaring the alias (or name) of the credential
        credential - the credential value to store
        credentialStoreType - a CredentialStoreType indicating which credential store facility to use
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException - if an error occurs while storing the new credential

      • getCredential

        Credential getCredential(String clusterName,
                         String alias)
                  throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Retrieves the specified credential looking in the temporary and then the persistent CredentialStore
        Parameters:
        clusterName - the name of the cluster the credential is related to
        alias - a string declaring the alias (or name) of the credential
        Returns:
        the requested Credential
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException - if an error occurs while retrieving the credential

      • getCredential

        Credential getCredential(String clusterName,
                         String alias,
                         CredentialStoreType credentialStoreType)
                  throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Retrieves the specified credential looking in ether the persistent or the temporary CredentialStore
        Parameters:
        clusterName - the name of the cluster this credential is related to
        alias - a string declaring the alias (or name) of the credential
        credentialStoreType - a CredentialStoreType indicating which credential store facility to use
        Returns:
        the requested Credential
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException - if an error occurs while retrieving the credential

        alias - a string declaring the alias (or name) of the credential
        Throws:

                      String alias,
                      CredentialStoreType credentialStoreType)
               throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Removes the specified credential from ether the persistent or the temporary CredentialStore
        Parameters:
        clusterName - the name of the cluster this credential is related to
        alias - a string declaring the alias (or name) of the credential
        credentialStoreType - a CredentialStoreType indicating which credential store facility to use
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException - if an error occurs while removing the credential

      • containsCredential

        boolean containsCredential(String clusterName,
                           String alias)
                    throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Tests to see if the requested alias exists in any CredentialStore
        Parameters:
        clusterName - the name of the cluster this credential is related to
        alias - a string declaring the alias (or name) of the credential
        Returns:
        true if it exists; otherwise false
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException - if an error occurs while searching for the credential

      • containsCredential

        boolean containsCredential(String clusterName,
                           String alias,
                           CredentialStoreType credentialStoreType)
                    throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Tests to see if the requested alias exists in ether the persistent or the temporary CredentialStore
        Parameters:
        clusterName - the name of the cluster this credential is related to
        alias - a string declaring the alias (or name) of the credential
        credentialStoreType - a CredentialStoreType indicating which credential store facility to use
        Returns:
        true if it exists; otherwise false
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException - if an error occurs while searching for the credential

      • getCredentialStoreType

        CredentialStoreType getCredentialStoreType(String clusterName,
                                           String alias)
                                    throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Gets the type of the credential store used to store the requested credential
        Parameters:
        clusterName - the name of the cluster this credential is related to
        alias - a string declaring the alias (or name) of the credential
        Returns:
        a CredentialStoreType
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException - if an error occurs while searching for the credential

      • listCredentials

        Map<String,CredentialStoreType> listCredentials(String clusterName)
                                         throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Maps the existing alias names to their relevant credential store types.
        Parameters:
        clusterName - the name of the cluster this credential is related to
        Returns:
        a map of alias names to CredentialStoreTypes
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException - if an error occurs while searching for the credentials

      • isInitialized

        boolean isInitialized()
        Tests this CredentialStoreService to check if it has been properly initialized
        Returns:
        true if initialized; otherwise false

      • isInitialized

        boolean isInitialized(CredentialStoreType credentialStoreType)
        Tests this CredentialStoreService to check if ether the persistent or the temporary CredentialStore has been properly initialized
        Parameters:
        credentialStoreType - a CredentialStoreType indicating which credential store facility to use
        Returns:
        true if initialized; otherwise false
